original_text: Then Judas, which had betrayed him, when he saw that he was condemned, repented himself, and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,
korean_text: 그 때에 예수를 판 유다가 그의 정죄됨을 보고 스스로 뉘우쳐 그 은 삼십을 대제사장들과 장로들에게 도로 갖다 주며

sentences.original_text: when he saw that he was condemned
and brought again the thirty pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다시 그 은 서른 개를 가져왔다

sentences.original_text: to the chief priests and elders
